---
name: RNR2_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae RNR2 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the RNR2 gene encoding the small subunit of ribonucleotide reductase in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is very mildly cell cycle regulated, coordinated with RNR1 for dNTP synthesis, but does not oscillate like RNR1, mostly just being upregulated in response to DNA damage.
